text: The WebappClassLoaderBase contains a "system" instance member that is never initialized. It seems like this bug was introduced when https://bz.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=55943 was fixed.
creator: alexbrand09@gmail.com

text:
I've deprecated it.

It is protected so removing it could cause problems for custom sub-classes.
creator: markt@apache.org
alexbrand09@gmail.com
text: Thanks for looking into this. Would it make sense to set system = j2seeClassLoader in addition to deprecating system?
